Package com.arjuna.jta

Interface Summary
JTA_XAConnectionRecovery XA connection implementations must provide an implementation of this class.
JTA_XAModifier Instances of this class enable us to work around problems in certain databases (specifically Oracle).
 

Class Summary
JTA_BaseTransaction Some common methods for UserTransaction and TransactionManager.
JTA_Environment The module specific properties which may be set to configure the system at runtime.
JTA_HeuristicType Enumeration type for the heuristic types which can be thrown.
JTA_ResourceRecord  
JTA_Synchronization Whenever a synchronization is registered, an instance of this class is used to wrap it.
JTA_Transaction An implementation of javax.transaction.Transaction.
JTA_TransactionManager An implementation of javax.transaction.TransactionManager.
JTA_UserTransaction An implementation of javax.transaction.UserTransaction.
JTA_Utility Some useful utility routines.
JTA_XID Implementation of javax.transaction.xa.Xid.
 

Exception Summary
NotImplementedException Exception may be thrown under certain circumstances.
